Basic

```js
require("./demo.css");

<LayoutGrid className="demo-grid">
  <LayoutGridCell className="demo-cell" span={4} />
  <LayoutGridCell className="demo-cell" span={4} />
  <LayoutGridCell className="demo-cell" span={4} />
</LayoutGrid>;
```

Grid of differently sized items

```js
require("./demo.css");

<LayoutGrid className="demo-grid">
  <LayoutGridCell className="demo-cell" span={6}>
    6
  </LayoutGridCell>
  <LayoutGridCell className="demo-cell" span={4}>
    4
  </LayoutGridCell>
  <LayoutGridCell className="demo-cell" span={2}>
    2
  </LayoutGridCell>
</LayoutGrid>;
```

Within a Card for form layouts

```js
require("./demo.css");

<Card>
  <CardText>
    <LayoutGrid nested className="demo-form-layout">
      <LayoutGridCell span={6}>
        <TextField label="First name" />
      </LayoutGridCell>
      <LayoutGridCell span={6}>
        <TextField label="Last name" />
      </LayoutGridCell>
      <LayoutGridCell span={12}>
        <TextField
          type="email"
          label="Email address"
          helperText={
            <TextFieldHelperText validation>
              Please enter a valid email address
            </TextFieldHelperText>
          }
        />
      </LayoutGridCell>
    </LayoutGrid>
  </CardText>
</Card>;
```
